channel.description: Add the user groups claim Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 329 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Customize tokens returned from Okta with a Groups claim: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/customize-tokens-groups-claim/main/ Why is this here?: This doc is under Manage user accounts because it discuss return the userâ€™s group information
